name: netsuite-custommodules-template
description: NS Template project for testing and using CI/CD for your NetSuite SuiteCloud projects.

scripts.clean: npm run clean-rmDocs && npm run clean-local
scripts.clean-local: rm -f src/deploy.xml && rm -f src/manifest.xml && rm -f .ci/.branch && rm -f project.json
scripts.setup-server: npm run install-SDF-cli && npm run generate-manifests --headbranch=$npm_config_headbranch --sourcebranch=$npm_config_sourcebranch --releaserun=$npm_config_releaserun --flatobjects=$npm_config_flatobjects --validaterun=$npm_config_validaterun
scripts.setup-server-token: npm run setup-server --headbranch=$npm_config_headbranch --sourcebranch=$npm_config_sourcebranch --releaserun=$npm_config_releaserun --flatobjects=$npm_config_flatobjects --validaterun=$npm_config_validaterun && npm run save-token --account=$npm_config_account --authid=$npm_config_authid --tokenid=$npm_config_tokenid --tokensecret=$npm_config_tokensecret
scripts.deploy: npm run add-ns-dependents && npm run suitecloud -- project:deploy --accountspecificvalues WARNING
scripts.generate-wiki: mkdir -p wiki && node .ci/config/docsMD.config.min.js && mv wiki/README.md wiki/HOME.md
scripts.docs: npm run clean && npm run generate-jsDocs && npm run generate-mdDocs && npm run generate-wiki
scripts.setup-local-customBranch: npm run generate-manifests --headbranch=production --sourcebranch=$npm_config_sourcebranch --releaserun=NO --flatobjects=NO --validaterun=NO && npm run install-SDF-cli && npm run add-ns-dependents

author: Ryan Valizan <ryan@vnetkc.com>
